statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_data WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM healthcare_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, gender, admission_date FROM healthcare_data WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM healthcare_data WHERE discharge_date IS NULL;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM healthcare_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM healthcare_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY diagnosis;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY admission_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM healthcare_data ORDER BY diagnosis ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, admission_date, discharge_date FROM healthcare_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%' ORDER BY admission_date;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, gender FROM patients WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT diagnosis_date, diagnosis_result FROM diagnoses WHERE patient_id = 3
SELECT city, analysis_result FROM outbreak_analysis WHERE outbreak_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT patient_id, age, name FROM patients
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC, name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT name, age, city FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;

SELECT patients.name, diagnoses.diagnosis_result, outbreak_analysis.city FROM patients JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id JOIN outbreak_analysis ON diagnoses.diagnosis_id = outbreak_analysis.diagnosis_id WHERE patients.age < 50 AND outbreak_analysis.city = 'New York' ORDER BY diagnosis_result DESC;

SELECT patients.name, diagnoses.diagnosis_date, outbreak_analysis.analysis_result FROM patients LEFT JOIN diagnoses ON patients.patient_id = diagnoses.patient_id LEFT JOIN outbreak_analysis ON diagnoses.diagnosis_id = outbreak_analysis.diagnosis_id WHERE patients.city = 'Los Angeles' AND diagnoses.diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM physicians ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT physician_name, contact_number FROM physicians WHERE hospital_name = 'Mount Sinai Hospital';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE diagnosis='Cancer' AND gender='Female';
SELECT physician_name, specialty FROM physicians WHERE hospital_name='General Hospital';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT disease_name, description FROM diseases WHERE outbreak_status=true ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, address FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 25;
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM diseases ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT disease_id, name, symptoms FROM diseases WHERE risk_factor = 'High';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT p.name, d.name AS disease_name, o.location FROM patients p JOIN diagnoses diag ON p.patient_id = diag.patient_id JOIN diseases d ON diag.disease_id = d.disease_id JOIN outbreaks o ON d.disease_id = o.disease_id;
SELECT DISTINCT d.name AS disease_name, d.symptoms, o.location FROM diseases d JOIN outbreaks o ON d.disease_id = o.disease_id;

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, d.name AS disease_name, diag.diagnosis_date FROM patients p JOIN diagnoses diag ON p.patient_id = diag.patient_id JOIN diseases d ON diag.disease_id = d.disease_id WHERE p.age < 30 ORDER BY diag.diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT disease_name, description FROM diseases WHERE disease_name LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM outbreaks ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, disease_id, diagnosis_date FROM patient_disease WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, disease_name, diagnosis_date FROM patients p JOIN patient_disease pd ON p.patient_id = pd.patient_id JOIN diseases d ON pd.disease_id = d.disease_id;
SELECT d.disease_name, t.treatment_name, t.duration FROM diseases d JOIN treatments t ON d.disease_id = t.treatment_id;

SELECT p.patient_name, d.disease_name, o.location FROM patients p JOIN patient_disease pd ON p.patient_id = pd.patient_id JOIN diseases d ON pd.disease_id = d.disease_id JOIN outbreaks o ON pd.disease_id = o.disease_id;
